short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Suggests whether to choose 'Hi' or 'Lo' in the game.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Using a Hybrid of Monte carlo simulations and Game theory followed by a hybrid of Nash Equilibrium and random algorithm  I bring to you the Hi Lo helper by Modern predictor which will guide you in your decision making process first test it and then do the rightful adjustment's to your Hi Lo 50/50 decisions.
